ValidationRule.description: Validates that the Phone field contains only valid phone number characters and has a minimum length
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Phone)), OR( LEN(Phone) < 8, LEN(Phone) > 50, NOT(REGEX(Phone, "^\\+[0-9\\s\\-\\(\\)\\.]+([xX]|ext|extension|;|,)?\\s*[0-9]*$")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Phone must start with + (country code), be 8-50 characters, and can include extensions (x123, ext 123, ;123, or ,123).
